adjectives.description: flavorless (comparative more flavorless, superlative most flavorless)

entries.meaning: Lacking taste or flavor; without seasoning, spice, or discernible qualities of taste.
examples: Salt oysters, on being transferred to fresh water, are "fattened" in the course of two or three days ; if allowed to remain longer they become lean again, and are flavorless.
[…]  and the gravestone of its dead owner on the hill was no more flavorless of his personality than was this plain house in which he had lived and died.
